identification_overview.title: Hurricane Ian Evacuation Decision-Making Survey: Lee County, Florida
identification_overview.abstract: Household survey examining evacuation timing, transportation choices, and destination decisions during Hurricane Ian.
identification_overview.purpose: Quantify drivers of evacuation to inform emergency management.

geographic_temporal.geographic_coverage_specific: Lee County, Florida — FEMA Evacuation Zones A–E

data_characteristics_methods.collection_methodology: Stratified random sample by evacuation zone; CATI + door-to-door follow-up
data_characteristics_methods.uncertainty: Standard errors and response rates reported

integration_with_other_data: NOAA storm surge models via FEMA zones
